main event: Witness observed unidentified flying objects resembling saucers in Dallas, Texas on August 15, 1949.
interesting points: The objects appeared to maintain a formation and seemed linked together without any visible connection., Objects were approximately the size and shape of a dinner plate., One side of the objects was silvery, while the other side was gray., The observer reported seeing the objects for about 3 to 5 minutes., Weather conditions included heavy clouds to the south with showers and lightning.
witness description: Mrs. [REDACTED], a housewife, observed the objects from her porch.
